body.p:
Carlisle Ky, Nov. 27th 1865
To His Excellency Gov. Bramlett
Frankfort Ky
Dr Sir

We the undersigned Citizens of Nicholas County would respectfully represent to your Excellency that John H Sims a Citizen of this County was fined at the last September Term of our Circuit Court Twenty nine dollars & costs of the prosecution for unlawful gaming and we would further represent that the said Sims is a very poor man -- unable to pay the fine & heavily burdend with a family We feel satisfied that he will not thus violate the Law again as he is now conducting himself in a very exemplary manner & demeaning himself as a good Citizen generally In view of all the circumstances of his Case with which we are intimately acquainted we venture to recommend him as a fit subject of Executive clemency & petition your Excellency to remit so much of his fine as the Law permits you to do

Respectfully yours
Chas Hillock Dep Sheriff
Henly Maddox
Samuel T James
Solomon Rogers
Uriah Morris
W. H. Phillips
G J Kennedy
Thomas Kennedy
Gran C Smith
H. W Conway
J R Pascal
John M Chevis C, N, C, C
A W Blair , N, C
